scripts.build: tsc && cp src/BiliBiliScript.[tj]s* build && sed -i '/^export/ d' build/BiliBiliScript.[tj]s && cp build/BiliBiliConfig.json build/dev-config.json && sed -i -e 's|"scriptUrl": "https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/56224394/jobs/artifacts/main/raw/build/BiliBiliScript.js?job=deploy-job",|"scriptUrl": "BiliBiliScript.js",|' build/dev-config.json
scripts.bun-release: bun install && bun update && bun x npm-check-updates && bun run bun-test && bun run bun-eslint
scripts.npm-release: npm install && npm update && npx npm-check-updates && npm test && npm run npm-eslint
scripts.bun-dev: bun run build && bun x http-server build
scripts.npm-dev: npm run build && npx http-server build
